text: Yesu yi sandani ito fan sa e xa, a naxa, “Muxu yo mi nɔɛ dugi nɛnɛn tongɛ, a yi a yibɔ, a dugi fonna bɛtɛrɛn a ra.5.36 dugi nɛnɛna: Yesu a sariya nɛnɛn mi sɛ Musaa sariya fonna ma. Sariya fonna mɔn mi sɛ sariya nɛnɛn ma. Xa a na liga, a dugi nɛnɛn kalama nɛn. Dugi dungi nɛnɛn fan mi lanɲɛ a fonna ma.
